00024 #define HOUSEHOLD 'H'
00025 #define NEIGHBORHOOD 'N'
00026 #define SCHOOL 'S'
00027 #define CLASSROOM 'C'
00028 #define WORKPLACE 'W'
00029 #define OFFICE 'O'
00030 #define HOSPITAL 'M'
00031 #define COMMUNITY 'X'

00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 class Person;
00036 extern int Strains;
00037 
00038 class Place {
00039 public:
00040   Place() {}
00041   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL ~Place() {}
00042   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void setup(int loc_id, const char *lab, double lon, double lat, Place *cont, Population *pop);
00043   virtual void reset();
00044   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void update(int day);
00045   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void print(int strain);
00046   virtual void add_person(Person * per);
00047   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void add_visitor(Person * per);
00048   virtual void add_susceptible(int strain, Person * per);
00049   virtual void delete_susceptible(int strain, Person * per);
00050   virtual void add_infectious(int strain, Person * per);
00051   virtual void delete_infectious(int strain, Person * per);
00052   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void print_susceptibles(int strain);
00053   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void print_infectious(int strain);
00054   virtual void spread_infection(int day, int strain);
00055   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int is_open(int day);
00056   
00057   virtual void get_parameters(int strain) = 0;
00058   virtual int get_group(int strain, Person * per) = 0;
00059   virtual double get_transmission_prob(int strain, Person * i, Person * s) = 0;
00060   virtual double get_contacts_per_day(int strain) = 0; // access functions
00061   virtual int should_be_open(int day, int strain) { return 1; }
00062   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_id() { return id; }
00063   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL char * get_label() { return label; }
00064   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_type() { return type; }
00065   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL double get_latitude() { return latitude; }
00066   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL double get_longitude() { return longitude; }
00067   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_S(int strain) { return S[strain]; }
00068   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_I(int strain) { return (int) (infectious[strain].size()); }
00069   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_symptomatic(int strain) { return Sympt[strain]; }
00070   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_size() { return N; }
00071   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_close_date() { return close_date; }
00072   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_open_date() { return open_date; }
00073   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_adults() { return adults; }
00074   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_children() { return children; }
00075   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL Population *get_population() { return population; }
00076   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_daily_cases(int strain) { return cases[strain]; }
00077   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_daily_deaths(int strain) { return deaths[strain]; }
00078   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_total_cases(int strain) { return total_cases[strain]; }
00079   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL int get_total_deaths(int strain) { return total_deaths[strain]; }
00080   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL double get_incidence_rate(int strain) { return (double) total_cases[strain] / (double) N; }
00081   
00082   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void set_id(int n) { id = n; }
00083   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void set_type(char t) { type = t; }
00084   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void set_latitude(double x) { latitude = x; }
00085   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void set_longitude(double x) { longitude = x; }
00086   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void set_close_date(int day) { close_date = day; }
00087   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void set_open_date(int day) { open_date = day; }
00088   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void set_population(Population *p) {  population = p; }
00089   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void set_container(Place *cont) { container = cont; }
00090   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void add_case() { cases++; }
00091   UNIT_TEST_VIRTUAL void add_deaths() { deaths++; }
00092   
00093 protected:
00094   int id;                                       // place id
00095   char label[32];                               // external id
00096   char type;                            // HOME, WORK, SCHOOL, COMMUNITY
00097   Place *container;                             // id of container place
00098   double latitude;                              // geo location
00099   double longitude;                             // geo location
00100   int N;                           // total number of potential visitors
00101   vector <Person *> *susceptibles;       // list of susceptible visitors
00102   set <Person *> *infectious;             // list of infectious visitors
00103   int *S;                                       // susceptible count
00104   int *I;                                       // infectious count
00105   int *Sympt;                                   // symptomatics count
00106   int close_date;                   // this place will be closed during:
00107   int open_date;                            //   [close_date, open_date)
00108   int adults;                                   // how many adults
00109   int children;                                 // how many children
00110   int * cases;                                  // symptomatic cases today
00111   int * deaths;                                 // deaths today
00112   int * total_cases;                          // total symptomatic cases
00113   int * total_deaths;                           // total deaths
00114   Population *population;
00115   int visit;
00116 
00117   // strain parameters
00118   double *beta;        // place-independent transmissibility per contact
00119 };
